verses.text: LORD, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.

Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul
is even as a weaned child.
Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever.

text:
LORD, my heart is not haughty, nor mine eyes lofty: neither do I exercise myself in great matters, or in things too high for me.
Surely I have behaved and quieted myself, as a child that is weaned of his mother: my soul
is even as a weaned child.
Let Israel hope in the LORD from henceforth and for ever.
